‚Ä¶ nice!!! After driving almost 7hrs from Sacramento it was great to stop and get some chow. Bathroom is clean they got a shower which is also great. I would say due to the construction of the freeway this place gets lots of traffic from the ‚Ä¶

This by far second worst place ive been. One of the employees stood outside the shower screaming at another employee. Like thats acceptable.  Why do we pay for showers that cause more anxiety than the shower helps?? Is our job not crazy ‚Ä¶
It's a good place to stop as a truck driver, women's bathroom usually clean, never had a dirty shower, would give 4 Stars but mgmt needs to say something about the homeless and scammers

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ here on our way to Arizona.  It's a great super gas station store. Amazed at all the things you can find here, from souvenirs,  hot foods, beverages,  emergency items and needs and even shower services for truckers. I was very impressed.

‚Ä¶ and it offers all sorts of snacks, hot and cold food and cold and hot drinks. There is even a Carl's Jr on site. All sorts of cell phone and travel accessories. There are plenty of restrooms and even a place to shower. Great souvenirs too.
5 am.  all showers out.  Asked Anthony at front desk why,  he said they were just out. ‚Ä¶

Diesel pumps glitchy/or don't work at the pump. Have to go inside for like the past month. Tp dispenser empty in the shower. Was it even cleaned? Coffee station the pour over coffee machines are too low to fill a thermos unlike every other ‚Ä¶

My 1st ever "Love's" experience was amazing here. Amazing employees, great shower's + laundry room, great variety of food + drink's + a very clean environment on the inside (sadly some of the locals + other disgusting trashy people in this ‚Ä¶

I drive through borron, ca twice a week and hit this loves for fuel and anything else I need. Tonight I just needed gas and a shower. No wait, super clean, and fresh warm towels. Not to mention big smiles. Great pit stop, desert people rock ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Operations Manager was awesome!  This is the best Loves! Carl‚Äôs Jr. was Slammed and I told him , not knowing who he was cause I wanted a shower and wait out that way the Rush they had. Well when I can out of shower,even more hungry, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 23 @ 5am. He is a  REAL HERO . He prevented a real crime today. I wanted to take a shower here , because I did an oil change at this location. I already spent almost $700 . My friend gave me his card to use a shower here . This guy said NO ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Rearly give five star rating. This Love's location is fairly new and fully equipped. Shower rooms are premium and the Speedco is on par with maintenance. Only 8 showers accommodate this location however there is free range parking. Meaning ‚Ä¶

Rude person, named Ashley, working fuel desk , strongly hinting , I was a lot lizard ü¶é when I tried getting ckd for shower - geeez, i can't believe our company spends 30,000+
monthly , for diesel here. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The only thing I would add is to relax after a long week/day. All I want/need is a nice hot shower. ‚Ä¶

Stopped here overnight to shower and rest, the RV motorcoach I was driving had a door malfunction and would not open.  Maintenance person Jesse came out and used a ladder to climb into the passenger window to open the entry door from the ‚Ä¶
I often stop here to take shower buy unfortunately most time the water is not hot and oily for some reason!!and at night time not surprising waiting over 30 mins in you are next position!!

Dirty showers this girl at night doesn‚Äôt take pride in her work, the first shower had a wad of hair in the toilet and the second well just look at the images. The counters had smudges in it where she placed the towels. Every driver who ‚Ä¶

Showers have recently been changed as of this review and are considerably worse. I've been coming to this location to shower for a while and have accumulated probably 15-20 here. I vanlife between LA and Barstow. ‚Ä¶
13 people waiting for a shower no one cleaning them asked the manager or supervisor on duty and he said there is someone cleaning them but no one is 3 in the afternoon!!
Shower was nice. Hot and good pressure. Rarely have pilot/flying j credits, and they seem to be the nicest, most of the time. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ spots for us to purchase on nights like that. Sure feels good to be able to depend on a spot to park up for the night and enjoy a relaxing Hot shower, good food, clean showers. They are spotless. Very quiet venue, really enjoyed the ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: Andrew Johnathon Brandon Earls Mccoy_‚Ä¶_spots_for_us_to_purchase_on_nights_like_that._Su_2 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Good size parking lot, has lots of free spots still available at 5:30pm. Showers were nice and good size and clean. My problem was barely warm water for the shower. The faucet water was scalding hot but barely warm for the shower. Very ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for trucks.  Restrooms were very clean.  I did have a problem with the shower but the staff quickly rectified the problem and apologized.   There is an outlet located across the street and lots of places to eat.  Staff always greets ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Edit, had to add as of 09/28/24 was amazing to shower here. Haven‚Äôt had a good shower like that at a TA for awhile. Really good water pressure, staid really cool inside with the AC not set to ‚Äúsave money‚Äù normally we walk out of TA shower ‚Ä¶

I stopped for fuel and a shower. I have to say the showers here are not bad. The water was hot and the room as fairly large had a sink private toilet and the shower head had a massage feature which is nice after driving a long time. The ‚Ä¶

Nice TA‚Ä¶ friendly staff, clean restrooms and very well  maintenance shower. And if you would like eat something different, you‚Äôre 15 min away from a plenty of restaurants‚Ä¶ just crossing the I-15. Oh, also there‚Äôs a Outlet near.

‚Ä¶ about 1500 i was back and had no issues. Plenty of coffee. I used a shower room (hate public restrooms) on both visits and as usual they were clean. Woulda been 5 stars but I had the coffee issue. Woulda also been 1 star but if there was no ‚Ä¶

On Saturday July 20th 2024 about 2 pm, my husband and I got a shower. I went to ask the attendant for extra towels and she was cleaning the toilet with the scrub brush. I did not want to bother her so I waited for her to finish. I watched ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ my sandwich she still refused to cut up onions. The subway wasn't busy either.. guys at the front counter were awesome and very good at making customers feel welcome. clean warm shower all around would be 5 stars if not for the subway lady

Its actually a decent truck stop. Lots of showers but they turn off the AC in the upstairs shower area so after the shower, your sweaty. The Black Bear diner is a big plus. The hair salon seems to have crazy hours. I've been there twice ‚Ä¶

Nice place to spend the night, shower ,  and eat , always friendly people. Be careful walking over by the stoplights , in the parking lot the concrete slabs for the parking are broken and have the rebar sticking out . My shoe laces got hung ‚Ä¶

I give 5 stars because of the friendliness. I went to get a shower and the male employee greeted me as I punched the numbers into the key pad and greeted me on my way out. And the lady at the register had a smile on her face.

This is where I always stop to get fuel and get shower , workout üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. Everybody is very helpful and the showers are always clean and the have 2 bathrooms so never have to wait for anything . Sometimes the showers can get busy at the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: want to complain about this gas station. üò°üò°This is the third time in two weeks that we are at this gas station and the shower does not work. Why? The shower works everywhere, but not at this gas station. Why do we fill up here but cannot ‚Ä¶
Best shower in USA! GREAT staff  working inside!
Waited here 1hr for shower. Coz no one was working in shower. Bad!!

It's a pretty busy location so prepare for lines. if you're here for the showers, you will find them generally clean and well kept. They serve a high volume of shower customers, so sometimes you'll have a wait, but you will have a hot clean ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ nice!!! After driving almost 7hrs from Sacramento it was great to stop and get some chow. Bathroom is clean they got a shower which is also great. I would say due to the construction of the freeway this place gets lots of traffic from the ‚Ä¶

Stopped at this place couple times while traveling and they are awesome!! They even have single 1 person restrooms you can use with a shower in them. They have good coffee and a verity of condiments for it as well. With the multiple gas ‚Ä¶

This by far second worst place ive been. One of the employees stood outside the shower screaming at another employee. Like thats acceptable.  Why do we pay for showers that cause more anxiety than the shower helps?? Is our job not crazy ‚Ä¶
It's a good place to stop as a truck driver, women's bathroom usually clean, never had a dirty shower, would give 4 Stars but mgmt needs to say something about the homeless and scammers

‚Ä¶ . The restroom is always above average and never a paper shortage. Very well attended to.the shower side for the weary traveler is reasonable priced and clean also. I travel the highways and byway the krammer junction store is where I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ place is ridiculous what is the point of stopping at a truck stop in the middle of nowhere only to not be able to shower I'm a trucker and rely on these places for this but no a remodel has everything but subway closed lot of good that does ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I expect when I fuel over 150 gallons every 3 days in truck stop I get free coffee and shower and some points like most of truck stop some truck stop small no showers I understand but charge for coffee it‚Äôs ridiculous

They have 6 really clean restroom‚Äôs, a huge parking lot which you can park for free, catscale‚Äôs are  $11 & housescale‚Äôs are $9 reweighs are $2. Shower‚Äôs are $10 unless you fuel more than 50 gallons. With the purchase of diesel you get a ‚Ä¶

This is for all truck drivers, if you stop and get fuel in a Holliday weekend,don't expect to take a shower, they will not give you one because they give preference to to people that stop for gas, just like that .
This is a great truck stop, the price for fule is lower than other places. It also has free parking. You can shower here aslo.
nice place to stop and rest shower or get more snakes or food for the road
Very clean and extra large shower!
It has everything. Truck stop has shower and everything. Very friendly people.
Good service, but no shower.
